attributes.action: Cancel IGCSE and International A levels
attributes.additional_details: Due to the severe disruption schools have faced due to the pandemic as many people got COVID multiple times as a result they have to isolate multiple times thus disrupting their education so taking exams is not fair even though there are support materials but they just cause even more confusion.
attributes.background: Government and ofqual  should make sure that international exams are cancelled

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about courses and assessments that are delivered by independent educational institutions, as opposed to state schools, are a matter for individual exam boards and educational institutions, not the Government or House of Commons.

As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.
